item.title: Thrust Management System (Including Autothrottle System) Thrust Mode Select Panel – CLB Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Automatic Climb Thrust Select option is installed and is operative.

numlitem.para: Takeoff thrust reduction will be performed automatically upon selection of any A/P pitch mode. If a G/A is desired, subsequent Climb Thrust must be set manually.

note.para: Climb Thrust setting may be determined from performance charts in QRH or AOM.

placard.para: Placard CLB Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
